column2: "I'm home."
"Welcome back, Meri. Oh, we have guests?"
"Ah! THIS must be Ilma?"
"This is Kukka. My brother."
"Pleased to meet you."
"You look surprised. We're quintuplets in all."
"Quintuplets?!"
"Yup. There's Taivas and Tulli, and then Ilma, Kukka, and me."
"Well, dang..."
"Do you live here by yourselves?"
"Yes. Our parents died when we were young, so we were raised by our grandpa, but..."
"He also passed away, not too long ago."
"Oh... I'm sorry..."
"Have you heard from Ilma?"
"There must be something to go on, like where he was headed or something."
"Out of all of us, Ilma's probably the hardest to understand, so..."
"He mostly just stayed in the lodge, totally devoted to his research. Every now and then, he'd suddenly leave to go investigate something."
"So we just thought this was one of those times and didn't think much of it at first..."
"Well hey, we're here to help you find him."
"That's great. We've kind of been in over our heads here."
"We appreciate the thought, but we can't impose on you like that."
"What...?"
"This is our family's problem, so we should be the ones to figure something out."
"Taivas and Tulli are already out looking. They'll do just fine, nothing to worry about."
"Those two know Kvalis like the back of their hand."
"Besides, you'll need them to guide you either way."
"Those two should be home before it gets dark, so just wait here."
"Anyways, I'm gonna finish getting the food ready. Have some."
